DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether vardenafil is effective in improving clinical symptoms and peripheral blood flow in patients with primary and secondary Raynaud phenomenon.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Vardenafil on Clinical Symptoms and Peripheral Blood Flow in Patients With Raynaud's Syndrome
